channel.title: github on Eunhan's library
channel.description: Recent content in github on Eunhan's library

item.title: uplaod [Android Studio Source code] to [Github]
item.description: 1. create repository in github: Repository is kind of folders on your github. Set name and create. Other settings are not needed. 2. taps on top of the Android Studio, click VCS -> Enable Version Control Integration. 3. It will ask something, choose git and push ok button. : There are many other websites that similar to github. Check buttom tab that has Git:master 4. click VCS -> Commit 5. Choose files that you want to upload.
